contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Heerde | image_skyline = Heerde3.jpg | image_caption = Town Hall Heerde | image_flag = Flag of Heerde.svg | flag_size = 120x100px | flag_alt = Flag of Heerde | image_seal = | seal_size = | seal_alt = | image_shield = Coat of arms of Heerde.svg | shield_size = 120x100px | shield_alt = Coat of arms of Heerde |image_map = LocatieHeerde.png |mapsize = 250px |latd=52|latm=23|lats=|latNS=N |longd=06|longm=03|longs=|longEW=E |coordinates_display = inline,title |coordinates_region = NL |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = [[Gelderland]] |area_footnotes = (2006) |area_total_km2 = 80.39 |area_land_km2 = 78.73 |area_water_km2 = 1.67 |population_as_of = 31 December, 2009 |population_note = Source: [[Statistics Netherlands|CBS]], [http://statline.cbs.nl/ Statline]. |settlement_type = Municipality |population_total = 18286 |population_density_km2 = 229 |timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] |utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +2 }} '''Heerde''' ({{pronunciation|Nl-Heerde.ogg}}) is a [[municipality]] and a town in the eastern [[Netherlands]]. Compared to the rest of the Netherlands, Heerde is fairly religious, as are many of the towns and cities in the [[Veluwe]] region. The following [[political parties]] are currently (August 2009) in the [[city council]]: [[Christian Democratic Appeal|CDA]] (5 seats), [[Dutch Labour Party|PvdA]] (5 seats), [[Reformed Political Party|SGP]] (3 seats), [[People's Party for Freedom and Democracy|VVD]] (2 seats) and the Municipal Farmers Party (2 seats). The municipality has five amateur soccer clubs: [http://www.vvheerde.net/news.php vv Heerde], SEH, WZC Wapenveld, vv Wapenveld and Vevo. == Population centres == *Heerde *[[Hoorn]] *[[Veessen]] *[[Vorchten]] *[[Wapenveld]] == Famous People from Heerde == *[[Jacco Eltingh]] (Heerde, 1970) Tennis player *[[Gerard van Velde]] ([[Wapenveld]], 1971) Speed skater *[[Toine Rorije]] (Heerde, 1974) Football player. Played for [[Go Ahead Eagles]] and [[F.C. Groningen]] ==External links== *{{Commons category-inline}} *[http://www.heerde.nl Official Website] {{Geographic location | Centre = Heerde | North = [[Hattem]] | Northeast = [[Zwolle]] ([[Overijssel|OV]]) | East = [[Olst-Wijhe]] ([[Overijssel|OV]]) | South = [[Epe]] | West = [[Oldebroek]] }} {{Gelderland Province}} [[Category:Municipalities of Gelderland]] [[Category:Populated places in Gelderland]] {{gelderland-geo-stub}}
